Rulings.Base:
1. Your opponent's Spell and Trap Cards that are already face-up on the field are unaffected by this effect. It only prevents new Spell and Trap Cards from being activated.
2. If you Tribute Set "Naturia Bamboo Shoot" by Tributing a 'Naturia' monster, its effect will not be applied even if you flip it up later.
3. If the effect of "Naturia Bamboo Shoot" is active but it's flipped face-down, its effect will not be applied when flipped face-up.
4. If "Naturia Bamboo Shoot" is temporarily removed from play with "Interdimensional Matter Transporter" and then returned to the field later, its effect will no longer be applied.
